Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are:

def has_sink_in_bathroom(sink:item):
    # Function to check if a sink is located in the bathroom
    symbol sink_in_bathroom=exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(sink, room)
    return sink_in_bathroom

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists sink: item : is_sink(sink) and has_sink_in_bathroom(sink):
            # If a sink in the bathroom has been found, approach it
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and has_sink_in_bathroom(sink)
            achieve close_char(char, sink)

        else:
            # Check all unvisited sinks in the scene
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                    observe(sink,"Check if the sink is located in the bathroom")

def can_fill_sink(sink:item):
    # Determine whether the sink can have water
    symbol water_access = exists faucet: item : is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
    return water_access

behavior fill_sink_with_water(sink:item):
    body:
        if can_fill_sink(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            achieve has_water(sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and id[sink] == 42
        fill_sink_with_water(sink)

def soapy_water_created(sink: item):
    # Function to check if the water in the sink has soap added to make it soapy
    symbol has_soapy_water=exists soap: item : is_soap(soap) and inside(soap, sink) and has_water(si
nk)
    return has_soapy_water

behavior mix_soap(sink: item, soap: item):
    body:
        achieve inside(soap, sink)
        # Ensure the soap is placed inside the sink to mix with the water

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and has_water(sink)
        # Select a sink that already has water
        
        if not soapy_water_created(sink):
            # If no soap has been added yet, proceed to add soap
            bind soap: item where:
                is_soap(soap) and close(soap, sink)
            # Select soap 2053 that is closest to the sink
            mix_soap(sink, soap)
